name: Oswaldo Montes
description1: Experienced Software Engineer and Full Stack developer with a focus on PHP (Laravel) and Ruby on Rails. Skilled in SQL, testing, and data modeling, along with expertise in frontend development using JavaScript (Vue.js). Dedicated to problem-solving and creating cutting-edge solutions in fast-paced environments.
description2: Known for a strong sense of responsibility and dedication, I thrive in environments that demand reliability and accountability. My commitment to excellence extends beyond technical expertise, as I prioritize clear communication, teamwork, and meeting deadlines. With a proactive approach and a passion for continuous improvement, I consistently strive to exceed expectations and deliver results that make a positive impact
